nodes.bodyText: Can you add this line back? Removing it will just cause commit conflicts and it isn't needed for the PR.

I think this needs to set shouldRefresh to true. If refresh was called directly, then shouldRefresh may not already be true. But we want it to be true so that this will not return metadata until a successful refresh.
Also, since current is called in commit, I think we will need to only set this in the case when currentMetadataWasAvailable. That way, creating a table will still work the same way.
